title: [Question] hi i have joined pes ec campus, i submitted my documents and after that i got no email , any fresher here to answer this

comments.body: HOW did u submit?? Courier or in person
In person
bro then the moment they give you acknowledgment of marksheet , there will be a series of email to your mail id. check the email id from which you have registered on [pes.edu](http://pes.edu)
I have got only one email its says thank you for submitting documents
I have physical copy of acknowledgement of receiving marksheet
bhai abhi itna hi aaega, make sure to login into pesu academy website with prn no. given on last sheet of paper provided by them
Done that already
Apparently the the profile updates have been paused as of now.someone told it will resume after kcet/jee 2nd round(told to them by office).even I submitted my docs but didn't get a mail so chill
Crazy part is there was no email for 2nd round also
I didnâ€™t even get this email. I submitted my documents on 3rd July.
Where can I find the password for it ?
Check promotions even i found my there
Nope I checked everywhere. Itâ€™s not there, what should I do ?
Calm down , just call their helpline if you are panicking or just wait you will get email for orientation
But how do ik whether my seat is confirmed or not ? Iâ€™m worried since I got no mail from their side after u submitted docs
Do you have your physical acknowledgement letter?
A small paper with acknowledgement written at the top ? Yes I have that.
I guess then it shouldn't be a problem
Ok
Even now?

I completed it.went to the app press those 3 lines top right corner go to student grievances and fill the form.
I didnt want mail everyday but now they send for photoðŸ˜­
